}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The '''3Com''' logo (big), "EtherLink III", "(C) 1995", "FCC ID: DF63C509B-TPO", a '''CE''' and '''VCI''' logo, "U.S. Patents: 5,307,459" is silkscreened on the left (top) side of the board. :"3C509B-TPO", "10 Mbps Signalling Rate", and "ASSY: 03-0020-"<printed 004>" REV-"<printed A> is :"FAB: 02-0020-004 REV B" is silkscreened on the board under the Ethernet transformer. :The Ethernet controller is labeled with... :*'''''Parallel Tasking''''' :*'''3Com''' :*'''40-0130-003''' :*'''9614S 04310892''' :*'''AT&T 40-01303'''
